video_title: The only OPINION that should matter. #mindset #success #selfimprovement
transcript:
what is your favorite quote my favorite
quote is from David Foster Wallace he
said you'll stop worrying so much what
other people think of you when you
realize how seldom they do so many
people hold themselves back because
they're afraid of other people's
opinions but in reality if you knew how
much people don't think about you you
would never actually care about other
people's opinions because the only
person whose opinion should actually
matter to you is you
